## Public Member Functions

### canLowerReturn() {#a018820d0fb56abe52c51565fb10c19ab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64CallLowering::canLowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">CallingConv::ID</a> CallConv, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/basearginfo">BaseArgInfo</a> &gt; &amp; Outs, bool IsVarArg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to check whether the return values described by <code>Outs</code> can fit into the return registers.

If false is returned, an sret-demotion is performed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h">AArch64CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp/#l00474">474</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.

### lowerCall() {#ad995047f82b555a8ceee0fba2af41899}

<MemberDefinition

### lowerFormalArguments() {#af647b791a2c24c4f48aa11d1a77a5bc5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64CallLowering::lowerFormalArguments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower the incoming (formal) arguments, described by <code>VRegs</code>, for GlobalISel.

Each argument must end up in the related virtual registers described by <code>VRegs</code>. In other words, the first argument should end up in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;0&#93;, the second in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;1&#93;, and so on. For each argument, there will be one register for each non-aggregate type, as returned by <code>computeValueLLTs</code>. <code>MIRBuilder</code> is set to the proper insertion for the argument lowering. <code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeded, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h">AArch64CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp/#l00638">638</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerReturn() {#a010cf32a5c68f9701c57d7a3172f1b3f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64CallLowering::lowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SwiftErrorVReg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower outgoing return values, described by <code>Val</code>, into the specified virtual registers <code>VRegs</code>.

This hook is used by GlobalISel.

<code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.

<code>SwiftErrorVReg</code> is non-zero if the function has a swifterror parameter that needs to be implicitly returned.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeds, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h">AArch64CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp/#l00357">357</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### supportSwiftError() {#aad7abed85788794ecd6b41cac4c84096}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::AArch64CallLowering::supportSwiftError () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if the target is capable of handling swifterror values that have been promoted to a specified register. The extended versions of lowerReturn and lowerCall should be implemented.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-h">AArch64CallLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### lowerTailCall() {#ad5e81985d1a66e10574be63a8f9abd39}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64CallLowering::lowerTailCall (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/callloweringinfo">CallLoweringInfo</a> &amp; Info, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">ArgInfo</a> &gt; &amp; OutArgs) const</>}>
